landing.pymeTitle: Built Specifically for Small and Medium Enterprises (PYMEs)
landing.pymeSubtitle: We understand the unique challenges that growing companies face. NodoHR is designed to scale with your business without the complexity or cost of enterprise solutions.
landing.pymePoint1Desc: Get up and running in minutes, not months. No complicated setup or IT expertise required.
landing.pymePoint2Desc: Start free and pay only as you grow. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees or long-term contracts.
landing.pymePoint3Desc: Built for Colombian labor laws, tax regulations, and social security requirements from day one.
landing.whyChooseTitle: Why PYMEs Choose NodoHR Over Traditional Solutions
landing.whyChooseSubtitle: Stop wasting time on manual processes and expensive HR consultants. NodoHR gives you enterprise-level capabilities at a fraction of the cost.
landing.benefit1Desc: Automate payroll calculations, vacation tracking, and document generation. Focus on growing your business, not paperwork.
landing.benefit2Desc: Replace expensive HR consultants and multiple software tools with one comprehensive, affordable solution.
landing.benefit3Desc: Built-in Colombian labor law compliance ensures you never miss deadlines or regulatory requirements.
landing.benefit4Desc: Whether you have 1 or 50 employees, NodoHR grows with your business seamlessly.
landing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about NodoHR for your business
landing.faq1Question: How quickly can I get started with NodoHR?
landing.faq1Answer: You can set up your account and start managing employees in under 15 minutes. Our intuitive interface requires no training or technical expertise.
landing.faq2Question: Is my data secure and compliant with Colombian regulations?
landing.faq2Answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and comply with all Colombian data protection laws. Your employee data is stored securely and backed up regularly.
landing.faq3Question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
landing.faq3Answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime with no penalties. Your data remains accessible during your billing period, and you can export everything before canceling.
landing.faq4Question: What happens when my business grows beyond 50 employees?
landing.faq4Answer: We offer enterprise plans for larger organizations. Contact our team and we'll create a custom solution that fits your expanded needs.
landing.faq5Question: Do you provide customer support in Spanish?
landing.faq5Answer: Yes! Our entire platform and customer support is available in Spanish. We understand the local market and are here to help you succeed.

overview.title: Dashboard - Overview
overview.description: The dashboard shows you a complete summary of your company: active employees, key metrics, growth trends and important alerts. Use filters to customize the view according to your needs.
overview.details: To make the most of the dashboard: 1) Check metrics daily, 2) Use date filters to analyze trends, 3) Click on cards to see specific details, 4) Set up alerts for critical metrics.

metrics.title: Metric Cards
metrics.description: The top cards show: Total employees, open positions, upcoming events and pending requests. Click any card to see details.
metrics.details: Each card is interactive and shows: current value, comparison with previous period (â†‘â†“), and direct access to the related section. Colors indicate status: green (good), yellow (attention), red (critical).

trends.title: Workforce Trends
trends.description: Visualize how your team has grown with interactive charts. Identify hiring patterns and plan future growth.
trends.details: Charts show: hires per month, staff turnover, growth by department. Use time controls to see different periods and zoom into specific data.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Quickly access the most common tasks: add employees, create departments, review time-off requests. Optimize your daily workflow.
quickActions.details: Quick actions change based on your role and permissions. Administrators see more options than managers. Customize which actions appear in Settings > Preferences.

dashboard.tip: Use date filters in metrics to see specific trends for your company.

overview.title: Employee Management - Introduction
overview.description: Here you can manage all your team information: personal data, work history, documents, evaluations and more. The table allows you to search, filter and export data easily.
overview.details: Employee management includes: profile creation, information updates, document management, evaluation tracking, portal access control, and custom report generation.

add.title: Add New Employees
add.description: Use the 'Add Employee' button to create complete profiles. Include personal data, contact information, position details, salary and profile photo. The system automatically generates a unique ID.
add.details: The process includes 4 steps: 1) Personal data (name, email, phone, address), 2) Work information (position, department, start date, salary), 3) Documents (contract, photo, certificates), 4) Portal access configuration.

profiles.title: Detailed Profiles
profiles.description: Each employee has a complete profile with tabs for: Personal information, work history, documents, evaluations, time off and more. Update data in real time.
profiles.details: Tabs include: General (basic data), Work (position, salary, history), Documents (contracts, certificates), Evaluations (performance, goals), Time Off (balance, history), Settings (access, permissions).

search.title: Advanced Search and Filters
search.description: Use the search bar to find employees by name, email or ID. Filters allow you to segment by department, status, hire date or any custom criteria.
search.details: Smart search: type any part of name, email, or ID. Available filters: department, status (active/inactive), hire date, salary range, contract type. Save frequent filters as 'favorites'.

employees.tip: Export the employee list regularly to maintain updated backups.

step1.title: Employee Management
step1.content: Here you can manage all your team information. Add new employees, edit profiles and manage portal access.

step2.title: Add Employees
step2.content: Click here to add a new employee. If you don't have departments created, the system will guide you to create one first.

step3.title: Employee Dashboard
step3.content: This panel shows quick statistics of your team: total employees, active, inactive and currently working.

step4.title: Upcoming Events
step4.content: Stay up to date with birthdays and work anniversaries of your team. Never forget to celebrate important moments.

step5.title: Search and Filters
step5.content: Use the search bar to find specific employees and filters to organize them by department.

step6.title: Employee List
step6.content: Here all your employees are shown with key information. On mobile they are displayed as cards, on desktop as a table.

step7.title: Employee Actions
step7.content: For each employee you can: edit information, generate documents, create portal access and more important actions.

step8.title: Portal Access
step8.content: Generate access tokens so employees can access their personal portal and manage their own requests.

step1.title: Vacation and Leave Management
step1.content: Here you manage everything related to time off: requests, balances, policies and vacation calendar.

step2.title: Update Balances
step2.content: This button automatically updates vacation balances based on anniversaries and company policies.

step3.title: Employee Search
step3.content: Search specifically for employee vacation balances to review their current status.

step4.title: Balances by Type
step4.content: Balances are grouped by leave type (vacation, sick, personal). Each card shows total, used and remaining days.

step5.title: Vacation Calendar
step5.content: Visualize all approved requests on a calendar. Ideal for planning and avoiding staff conflicts.

step6.title: Request Management
step6.content: Review, approve or reject time off requests. Includes requests from employee portal and internal requests.

step7.title: Time Off Policies
step7.content: Configure vacation rules: days per year, leave types, and special conditions for your company.

step8.title: Request Status
step8.content: Requests have different statuses: pending (yellow), approved (green), rejected (red). You can change status with a click.

step1.title: Document Management
step1.content: Centralize all your company documents: contracts, policies, certificates and more. Organize, share and manage digital signatures.

step2.title: Create Categories
step2.content: Before uploading documents, create categories to organize them (e.g.: Contracts, Policies, Certifications).

step3.title: Upload Documents
step3.content: Click here to upload new documents. You can associate them with specific employees and categories.

step4.title: Documents vs Templates
step4.content: Documents: specific files. Templates: reusable formats to generate personalized documents.

step5.title: Advanced Search
step5.content: Search by document name, associated employee, and filter by category or specific employee.

step6.title: Browse by Categories
step6.content: Click on any category to filter documents. Each category shows the number of documents it contains.

step7.title: Document Views
step7.content: Switch between grid view (ideal for images) and list view (better for detailed information).

step8.title: Document Actions
step8.content: For each document you can: view, download, share, request digital signature, or delete.

step9.title: Digital Signature
step9.content: Documents can require digital signatures. The system manages the signature workflow and notifications automatically.
